alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued September 02 at 6:34PM MST until September 02 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 633 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Chandler Fashion Center Mall to 6 miles west of Bapchule to near Olberg, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 163 and 202. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 167 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 126 and 148, and between mile markers 159 and 160. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, La Palma, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Arizola, Randolph, Blackwater, Firebird Lake, Sacaton, Santan and Mobile. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
